## Homework


```{r}
## Homework grades from Fall 2017
dfHW <- structure(list(Adj = c(66.7857143, 63.2142857, 69.2857143, 86.4285714, 
73.2142857, 93.5714286, 72.8571429, 48.5714286, 49.2857143, 96.4285714, 
81.0714286, 91.0714286, 71.4285714, 97.8571429, 52.1428571, 90.3571429, 
76.7857143, 44.2857143, 91.4285714, 87.1428571, 83.2142857, 44.6428571, 
89.6428571, 62.5, 96.0714286, 67.5, 82.5, 85, 93.2142857, 81.7857143, 
72.5, 95.3571429, 87.1428571, 88.5714286, 95, 95.3571429, 84.2857143, 
94.2857143, 89.2857143, 94.2857143, 99.6428571, 86.4285714, 88.5714286, 
94.6428571, 87.1428571, 89.6428571, 91.0714286, 86.7857143, 96.4285714, 
95.3571429, 98.9285714, 97.1428571, 32.5, 71.0714286, 95, 90.3571429, 
96.4285714), X.IN = c(64.7058824, 64.7058824, 70.5882353, 100, 
88.2352941, 94.1176471, 82.3529412, 47.0588235, 70.5882353, 100, 
94.1176471, 100, 70.5882353, 100, 58.8235294, 100, 82.3529412, 
52.9411765, 88.2352941, 100, 94.1176471, 41.1764706, 88.2352941, 
58.8235294, 94.1176471, 70.5882353, 100, 76.4705882, 94.1176471, 
94.1176471, 94.1176471, 100, 94.1176471, 94.1176471, 100, 100, 
88.2352941, 100, 82.3529412, 100, 94.1176471, 82.3529412, 94.1176471, 
100, 94.1176471, 100, 100, 88.2352941, 100, 94.1176471, 88.2352941, 
100, 41.1764706, 100, 100, 100, 100)), class = "data.frame", .Names = c("Adj", 
"X.IN"), row.names = c(NA, -57L))
hw.lbl1 <- "Final HW Percent"
hw.lbl2 <- "Percent HW Handed In"
```
```{r HW1}
hist(~Adj,data=dfHW,xlab=hw.lbl1,w=5,ylim=c(0,15))
```
```{r HW2}
plot(Adj~X.IN,data=filter(dfHW,Adj>=70),
     pch=21,bg="lightblue",
     xlim=c(30,100),ylim=c(30,100),
     xlab=hw.lbl2,ylab=hw.lbl1)
points(Adj~X.IN,data=filter(dfHW,Adj<70),
       pch=21,bg="red")
grid(col="gray90")
```
